titles.title: Reducing Obesity in Youth Act of 2020
Reducing Obesity in Youth Act of 2020
A bill to amend the Public Health Service Act to promote healthy eating and physical activity among children.

action.text: Read twice and referred to the Committee on Health, Education, Labor, and Pensions.

committee.name: Senate Health, Education, Labor, and Pensions

bill.summary:
Reducing Obesity in Youth Act of 2020
This bill requires the Centers for Disease Control and Prevention, in coordination with the Administration for Children and Families, to award grants to nonprofits, institutions of higher education, or consortia of these entities to promote healthy eating and physical activity among children in early care and education settings.
